amendment.description: Amendment expands the types of renewable fuels eligible for a grant program in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in House Report 109-49 to make producers of "approved renewable fuels" eligible for grants to build production facilities for renewable fuels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 190 (Roll no. 125).
